overview: Grab a towel, you're sitting in the splash zone for the pool party. Casey decided to invite all her new friends over for what turned into a summertime screwfest. Casey and Justice played chicken fight and hide the sausage . Tommy and Mia got down in the grass while Lexi and Mysti decided to share Johnny in a threeway. Jack paid extra special attention to Kelly but managed to get a sample from every girl. Food, drinks, tits and ass, this film is packed full of sex. Casey sure knows how to have a screwing blast!
title: Shane's World 39: Casey's Pool Party
